findings.message: RENTCONTROL (0x752a95f199eca0335738ce0cef859fc56ee2c3d4.sol#34-533) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:RENTCONTROL.transfer(address,uint256) (0x752a95f199eca0335738ce0cef859fc56ee2c3d4.sol#365-375)
findings.name: erc20-interface

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.24 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.24 (0x752a95f199eca0335738ce0cef859fc56ee2c3d4.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RENTCONTROL.withdraw() (0x752a95f199eca0335738ce0cef859fc56ee2c3d4.sol#323-334):
	External calls:
	- _customerAddress.transfer(_dividends) (0x752a95f199eca0335738ce0cef859fc56ee2c3d4.sol#331)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- onWithdraw(_customerAddress,_dividends) (0x752a95f199eca0335738ce0cef859fc56ee2c3d4.sol#333)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RENTCONTROL.withdrawPart(uint256) (0x752a95f199eca0335738ce0cef859fc56ee2c3d4.sol#336-348):
	External calls:
	- _customerAddress.transfer(_amount) (0x752a95f199eca0335738ce0cef859fc56ee2c3d4.sol#345)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- onWithdraw(_customerAddress,_amount) (0x752a95f199eca0335738ce0cef859fc56ee2c3d4.sol#347)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas
